task.title: Refinish The Platen Roller
task.shortdesc: After cleaning, removing, and sanding the original roller surface, follow the next steps to refinish the roller.

step.cmd: Unwrap and open the heat shrink tubing.
Measure the length of the platen roller and add 1 inch in length to the obtained measurement.
Cut the tubing to the necessary length.
Insert the platen roller into the tubing, ensuring it is centered on the roller with equal lengths of overlap on each side.
Apply heat evenly to the entire tubing length using a heat gun until the new tubing has fully adhered to the roller.
Insert the newly refinished platen roller into the typewriter using the section below, titled "Insert the Platen Roller."
